anycapes.configuration.title: AnyCapes Configuration
anycapes.options.cape_urls.tooltip:
Images will be downloaded top to bottom from the list.
The first successful download will be set as the cape.
Visit the website for more information.
anycapes.options.use_caching.tooltip:
If yes, cape textures will be saved to a file.
If a texture has been downloaded before, it will
load faster but will not update if it changed online.
